title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Problem-Based Team Project Design for Pharmaceutical Education Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively design team-based service models to address patient care gaps in local community pharmacy settings.
Learners can propose projects that align with the IHI Triple Aim (patient experience, population health, cost efficiency) by applying leadership theories.

Learners write a 2-page self-reflection journal based on weekly formative feedback during a 4-week team project, perform leadership roles (e.g., leading meetings, task distribution) at least twice, and achieve a score of 4 or higher on a peer evaluation (5-point scale).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
